DESCRIPTION: #yHealthy effects trigger if you are above #b50% of your max health.
#yWounded effects trigger if you are at or below #b50% of your max health.
Starts at the bottom of your draw pile.
When your deck is reshuffled, move to the bottom of the draw pile.
When your deck is reshuffled, move to the top of the draw pile.
Move an amount of cards from the top of your draw pile to your discard pile. Gain #pVoid for each card moved.
If this card would be #yMilled, add it to your hand instead of the discard pile.
Release all #yRunes you have #yEtched.
Your ability to fight the influence of the artifact.
Fracture effects happen when you have #bX or more #yWill.
Creatures take more damage for each #yDoom they have.
Increase the damage and #yBlock of the next card you play this turn that attacks or #yBlocks.
Do the following effect the first time this card is played each combat.
Gain a #yRune which can be #yReleased to trigger special effects.
#yRunes can have Passive effects and effects when they are #yReleased.
Each turn, increase the damage of the next attack you play. NL #yRelease: Gain temporary #yStrength.
Whenever you lose HP, gain #yBlock next turn. #yRelease: Gain #yBlock twice.
Heal HP at the end of combat. NL #yRelease: Take damage.
#yRelease: If you are #yHealthy, gain #yDexterity. If you are #yWounded, gain #yStrength.
ALL enemies and you.
Repeat this card's effects an additional number of times equal to its #pVoidbound.
Grant an effect to a card for the rest of combat.
Return a card from your #yExhaust pile to your hand.
AFTER this card is played, draw this many cards and gain this much energy.
The next time you #yBlock, gain this much additional #yBlock.
